## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### From PyPI (Recommended)
```bash
pip install mockexchange-gateway==VERSION
```

### From GitHub
```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/didac-crst/mockexchange-gateway.git@vVERSION
```

### With Poetry
```bash
poetry add mockexchange-gateway@VERSION
```

## ğŸ”— Dependencies
